parts.text: {"word":"dropped","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(物を)落とす、落とすことによって～する","english_definition":"to let something fall; to allow something to fall unintentionally.","examples":[{"sentence":"He dropped the glass.","translation":"彼はグラスを落とした。"},{"sentence":"She dropped her keys on the floor.","translation":"彼女は鍵を床に落とした。"},{"sentence":"I dropped my phone in the toilet.","translation":"トイレに携帯を落としてしまった。"}],"collocations":["drop a ball (ボールを落とす、へまをする)","drop a hint (ヒントを出す)","drop a line (手紙を書く)","drop anchor (錨を下ろす)"],"synonyms":["let fall","release","lower","dump"],"antonyms":["pick up","raise","lift"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"(物が)落ちる、落下する","english_definition":"to fall or allow something to fall vertically.","examples":[{"sentence":"The apple dropped from the tree.","translation":"リンゴが木から落ちた。"},{"sentence":"Tears dropped from her eyes.","translation":"彼女の目から涙がこぼれ落ちた。"},{"sentence":"The temperature dropped suddenly.","translation":"気温が急に下がった。"}],"collocations":["prices drop (価格が下がる)","temperature drops (気温が下がる)","sales drop (売り上げが落ちる)"],"synonyms":["fall","descend","plummet","decline"],"antonyms":["rise","increase","ascend"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(人を)降ろす、立ち寄る","english_definition":"to allow someone to get out of a vehicle; to stop briefly at a place.","examples":[{"sentence":"I'll drop you off at the station.","translation":"駅まで送って行きます。"},{"sentence":"Can you drop me off near the supermarket?","translation":"スーパーの近くで降ろしてもらえますか？"},{"sentence":"I dropped by his office to say hello.","translation":"挨拶に彼のオフィスに立ち寄った。"}],"collocations":["drop someone off (人を降ろす)","drop by (立ち寄る)","drop in (立ち寄る)"],"synonyms":["discharge","unload","deliver","visit"],"antonyms":["pick up","collect"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(計画・関係など)を打ち切る、やめる","english_definition":"to stop doing or planning something; to end a relationship.","examples":[{"sentence":"They dropped the charges against him.","translation":"彼に対する告訴は取り下げられた。"},{"sentence":"She dropped out of college after a year.","translation":"彼女は1年で大学を中退した。"},{"sentence":"He dropped his membership in the club.","translation":"彼はクラブの会員資格を放棄した。"}],"collocations":["drop a course (講座を辞める)","drop a lawsuit (訴訟を取り下げる)","drop a friend (友達との関係を断つ)"],"synonyms":["abandon","cancel","terminate","discontinue","withdraw"],"antonyms":["continue","pursue","maintain"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(声・音など)を小さくする、下げる","english_definition":"to make a voice or sound quieter; to lower something.","examples":[{"sentence":"He dropped his voice to a whisper.","translation":"彼は声を落としてささやいた。"},{"sentence":"She dropped her gaze.","translation":"彼女は目を伏せた。"}],"collocations":["drop your voice (声を落とす)","drop your eyes (目を伏せる)"],"synonyms":["lower","reduce","soften","muffle"],"antonyms":["raise","increase","amplify"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(手紙・メッセージなど)を送る、伝える","english_definition":"to send or communicate something, often casually.","examples":[{"sentence":"Drop me a line when you get there.","translation":"着いたら連絡してね。"},{"sentence":"I'll drop you an email later.","translation":"後でメールするね。"}],"collocations":["drop a line (手紙を送る)","drop a message (メッセージを送る)"],"synonyms":["send","communicate","inform","notify"],"antonyms":["receive","withhold"]}],"etymology":{"value":"「drop」の過去形・過去分詞。古英語の「droppan」（落ちる、滴る）に由来。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/drɒpt/","syllables":"dropped (1 syllable)"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["drop","drops"],"past_simple":"dropped","past_participle":"dropped","present_participle":"dropping"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**dropped**」は「drop」の過去形・過去分詞であり、基本的な意味は「落とした」です。しかし、「drop」自体が多義語であるため、「dropped」も文脈によって様々な意味を持ちます。物理的に何かを落とした、人が乗り物を降りた、計画や関係を打ち切った、声や音を小さくした、手紙やメッセージを送った、などの意味があります。また、自動詞として「落ちた、下がった」という意味でも使われます。句動詞（phrasal verbs）としても頻繁に使われ、それぞれ特有の意味を持ちます。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ He dropped to the floor. (意図的に落としたニュアンス)","correct":"✓ He fell to the floor. (偶然に落ちたニュアンス)","note":"意図的に何かを落としたのではなく、偶然に落ちた場合は「fell」を使う方が自然です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ I dropped my keys. Where are they? (状況が不明確)","correct":"✓ I dropped my keys. Now I can't find them. (結果が明確)","note":"鍵を落とした結果、どうなったのかを付け加えることで、状況がより明確になります。"},{"incorrect":"✗ She dropped her from the car.","correct":"✓ She dropped her off from the car. / ✓ She dropped her off at the car.","note":"「drop off」は句動詞であり、通常「drop someone off」の形で使われます。場所を示す場合は「at」や「near」などの前置詞を使います。"},{"incorrect":"✗ He dropped the class because it was too hardly.","correct":"✓ He dropped the class because it was too hard.","note":"「hardly」は「ほとんど～ない」という意味なので、「hard」を使うのが正しいです。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["drop (名詞: 滴、落下、少量、動詞: 落とす、滴る)","dropout (名詞: 脱落者、中退者)","dropping (名詞: 落下、滴下、(動物の)糞)","droppings (名詞: (動物の)糞)"],"phrasal_verbs":["drop by/in (立ち寄る)","drop off (うとうとする、眠り込む、人を降ろす、物を届ける、減る)","drop out (脱落する、中退する)","drop back (後退する、遅れる)","drop behind (遅れる)","drop down (かがむ、しゃがむ、(数などが)減る)","drop on (偶然見つける、偶然会う)","drop over (立ち寄る)","drop round (立ち寄る)","drop through (失敗する、うまくいかない)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"A2 (基本的な「落とす」の意味)、B1 (その他の意味、句動詞)","frequency_google_ngram":"高頻度 (High frequency) - 日常会話や文章でよく使われる単語。","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"「**dropped**」は「drop」の過去形または過去分詞で、「落とした」という意味が基本です。例えば、「I **dropped** my phone.（携帯を落とした）」のように使います。他にも、「（人を）降ろす」、「（計画などを）やめる」、「立ち寄る」など、色々な意味があります。文脈によって意味が変わるので、注意が必要です。また、「drop off（うとうとする）」や「drop out（中退する）」のような句動詞もよく使われます。","example_sentences":[{"sentence":"She **dropped** her keys in the water.","translation":"彼女は鍵を水の中に落とした。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"落とす"},{"sentence":"The ball **dropped** to the ground.","translation":"ボールは地面に落ちた。","type":"verb (vi)","meaning_category":"落ちる"},{"sentence":"I **dropped** him off at the airport.","translation":"彼を空港で降ろした。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"降ろす"},{"sentence":"They **dropped** the charges due to lack of evidence.","translation":"証拠不足のため、彼らは告訴を取り下げた。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"やめる"},{"sentence":"He **dropped** his voice so no one could hear.","translation":"彼は誰にも聞こえないように声を落とした。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"下げる"},{"sentence":"I **dropped** her a line to see how she was doing.","translation":"彼女がどうしているか知りたくて手紙を送った。","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"送る"},{"sentence":"The temperature **dropped** significantly overnight.","translation":"気温は一晩で大幅に下がった。","type":"verb (vi)","meaning_category":"下がる"}]}
